title: Natura Restaurante
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Health food and vegetarian Mexican cuisine with lots of salads and juices. Ecological architecture with outside terrace with garden and interior surrounded by endemic plants. Pet-friendly, free Wi-Fi. Formerly 100% Natural restaurant which is listed here on HappyCow.
